comment.author: 79809000@N00
comment._content: The title of this picture is slightly understated.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content:
You are quite right -- sometimes the titles on these slides leaves a bit to the imagination... They were used as teaching aids, so I suppose the people labeling them weren't as descriptive as we'd like.

Please let us know if you know anything more and we can add it!
